title: Qualified Business Income Deduction Add-Back
description: Concerning the requirement for certain taxpayers to add back an amount equal to their federal deduction for qualified business income allowed under section 199A of the federal"Internal Revenue Code of 1986" for purposes of determining their state taxable income.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Corporate Income Tax Foreign Jurisdictions
description: Concerning corporate income taxation related to foreign jurisdictions.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Insurance Premium Tax Rate for Home Offices
description: Concerning adjustments to the insurance premium tax rate tax expenditure for a home office or regional home office.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Sale of Tax Credits
description: Concerning authorizing the department of the treasury to sell tax credits to qualified taxpayers, and, in connection therewith, creating and allocating the proceeds to the tax credit sale proceeds cash fund and transferring the proceeds to the general fund and making an appropriation.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Eliminate State Sales Tax Vendor Fee
description: Concerning the elimination of the sales tax vendor fee that retailers are authorized to retain in connection with collecting and remitting state sales tax, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Improve Affordability Private Health Insurance
description: Concerning modifications to the Colorado health insurance affordability enterprise to address the affordability of health insurance in the individual market using nonappropriated funding sources, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Health Insurance Affordability Enterprise Board Appointment
description: Concerning additional criteria regarding who the governor may appoint as members of the board that oversees the Colorado health insurance affordability enterprise.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Consumer Protections for Artificial Intelligence Interactions
description: Concerning consumer protections in interactions with artificial intelligence systems.
last_action: House Third Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments

title: Artificial Intelligence Systems
description: Concerning artificial intelligence systems.
last_action: House Committee on Business Affairs & Labor Postpone Indefinitely

title: Continuity of Care for Impacted Communities
description: Concerning continuity of care for disproportionately impacted communities.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Health Providers Practice Scope Preventive Care
description: Concerning certain health-care providers providing preventive health-care services that are within the scope of their practice.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Prescription Drug Benefit Information Transparency
description: Concerning prescription drug sourcing provided pursuant to a health benefit plan.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Limit Subsidies Health Insurance Affordability Enterprise
description: Concerning narrowing eligibility for subsidies allocated by the health insurance affordability enterprise.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Health Insurance Affordability Fund Allocation
description: Concerning the allocation of money in the health insurance affordability cash fund.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Preserve Medicaid Health-Care Services
description: Concerning prohibiting state reimbursement for certain services provided to certain individuals, and, in connection therewith, prohibiting reimbursement for a provider who, or entity or facility that, performs, assists, or refers a person to abortion or gender-affirming health-care services and prohibiting reimbursement for medical services to a person who does not satisfy certain citizenship or residency requirements.
last_action: House Committee on Health & Human Services Postpone Indefinitely

title: Spending Reduction Procedures
description: Concerning procedures for the governor to reduce spending when there is a reduction in revenue to the state, and, in connection therewith, requiring the governor to reduce spending based on interim revenue estimates and to notify and consult with the joint budget committee when implementing a spending reduction plan, and requiring the governor and the legislative council staff to present any updated revenue estimates to the joint budget committee.
last_action: House Committee on Appropriations Postpone Indefinitely

title: Transfer of Money in Refinance Discretionary Account
description: Concerning a transfer of money from the refinance discretionary account created in the ARPA refinance state money cash fund to the health insurance affordability cash fund.
last_action: House Committee on Appropriations Postpone Indefinitely

title: Income Tax Credit Adjustment
description: Concerning the adjustment of certain income tax credits, and, in connection therewith, authorizing the department of revenue to sell certain income tax credits to qualified taxpayers and temporarily suspending or prorating income tax credits based on revenue estimates.
last_action: House Committee on State, Civic, Military, & Veterans Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Prohibit Certain Cash Fund Use Against Federal Action
description: Concerning the repeal of the authority granted to the office of the governor by House Bill 25-1321 to expend money in the "Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act" cash fund to support the state in defending against adverse federal action, and, in connection therewith, reducing an appropriation.
last_action: House Committee on State, Civic, Military, & Veterans Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Additions to Definition Federal Taxable Income
description: Concerning additions to the definition of federal taxable income for purposes of determining a taxpayer's state taxable income.
last_action: House Committee on State, Civic, Military, & Veterans Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Retention of Vendors Fees for Collecting Sales Tax.
description: Concerning the retention of the sales tax vendor fee for collecting and remitting state sales tax.
last_action: House Committee on State, Civic, Military, & Veterans Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Condemning the Conduct of Representative Ryan Armagost
description: Concerning the condemnation of the conduct of former Representative Ryan Armagost.
last_action: Signed by the Speaker of the House

title: Voter Approval for State Vendor Fee Reductions
description: Submitting to the registered electors of the state of Colorado an amendment to the Colorado constitution concerning the creation of new law that requires the state to obtain voter approval in advance for any reduction to the amount of state sales tax revenue that retailers are allowed to keep to cover their expenses of collecting state sales tax on behalf of the state.
last_action: House Committee on State, Civic, Military, & Veterans Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Governor Proclamation to Allow General Assembly to Address Budget
description: Submitting to the registered electors of the state of Colorado an amendment to the Colorado constitution concerning the modification of existing law to protect the separation of powers by requiring a governor's proclamation convening the general assembly to respect the general assembly's authority to legislate.
last_action: House Committee on State, Civic, Military, & Veterans Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Processes to Reduce Spending During Shortfall
description: Concerning the processes for the governor to reduce spending when the state is unable to meet its fiscal obligations, and, in connection therewith, requiring the governor to present spending reduction plans to the joint budget committee and receive advice from the joint budget committee.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: State-Only Funding for Certain Entities
description: Concerning state-only funding for entities that are prohibited from receiving reimbursement from the federal centers for medicare and medicaid services due to the entity providing certain reproductive health-care services.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Healthy School Meals For All
description: Concerning supporting access to healthy food for Coloradans, and, in connection therewith, amending the ballot issue language for a measure on the November 2025 ballot and modifying the permissible uses of the healthy school meals for all cash fund.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Increase Transparency for Algorithmic Systems
description: Concerning measures effective no later than June 30, 2026, to increase transparency for algorithmic systems.
last_action: Governor Signed

title: Reallocate Department of Natural Resources Wolf Funding to Health Insurance Enterprise
description: Concerning a reallocation of funding from the division of parks and wildlife for the reintroduction of gray wolves to the Colorado health insurance affordability enterprise, and, in connection therewith, reducing an appropriation.

title: Tax Credit for Health Savings Accounts
description: Concerning an income tax credit for contributions to a health savings account.

title: Immigration Status Low-Income Health Insurance Coverage
description: Concerning limiting certain health-care coverage that relies on public funds, and, in connection therewith, limiting eligibility for certain state-subsidized individual health-care coverage and prohibiting state reimbursement for medical services provided to individuals who are not lawfully residing.
last_action: Senate Committee on State, Veterans, & Military Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Tech-Neutral Anti-Discrimination Clarification Act
description: Concerning clarifying anti-discrimination protections in interactions with artificial intelligence systems.

title: Income Tax Credit Adjustment
description: Concerning the adjustment of certain income tax credits, and, in connection therewith, authorizing the department of revenue to sell certain income tax credits to qualified taxpayers and temporarily suspending or prorating income tax credits based on revenue estimates.
last_action: Senate Committee on State, Veterans, & Military Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Voter Approval Additions to Federal Taxable Income
description: Submitting to the registered electors of the state of Colorado an amendment to the Colorado constitution concerning the creation of new law that requires the state to obtain voter approval in advance for any addition to the definition of federal taxable income for purposes of determining a taxpayer's state taxable income, regardless of whether the state would gain revenue, or the extent to which the state would gain revenue, due to the addition to the definition of federal taxable income.
last_action: Senate Committee on State, Veterans, & Military Affairs Postpone Indefinitely

title: Adjournment Sine Die
description: Concerning adjournment sine die of the First Extraordinary Session of the Seventy-fifth General Assembly.
